name: The Gallery (Reliq Studios)
description:
“The Gallery is a single-player game about an artist called Billie. Billie has only one night left to finally come to terms and finish her final canvas to which she decided to paint a portrait of her mother and try to get over her fear and inability to paint faces. Little did she expect that the gallery will come to life and all her demons will come out of her painting to haunt her.” 

Control Scheme 

WASD - Move. 

E - Interact.

 Space Bar - Jump.

Left Mouse Button - Pick Up/Drag. 

Right Mouse Button - Throw.

DISCLAIMER THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES
